subject: re:using weblogic with junit
msgSnippet: Hi I need some help. I need to deploy my weblogic server each time i test my junits.As a result, a lot of time gets wasted. I would appreciate some help.
messageBody:
Hi
I need some help. I need to deploy my weblogic server each time i test
my junits.As a result, a lot of time gets wasted. I would appreciate
some help.

thanks
Devesh Khattar
